question: India’s first container trans-shipment terminal is under construction in which of the following states?
explanation: India’s first container trans-shipment terminal has been opened at Vallarpadam at Cochin port in Kerala. The Adani group has started construction of the country's first trans-shipment port. Trans-shipment terminals are intermediate ports for sea freight to offload before proceeding to destination ports. The project, which was envisaged 25 years ago, will receive a grant of Rs. 16 billion in viability gap funding from the government, reports Reuters. The port aims to attract businesses from other major ports in Asia.
